channel.title: Java Heap Error - OutofMemory ; Help as Soon as Possible Would be Appreciated
channel.description:
Unfortunately, I have a problem with a client, at the moment.
The "Java heap space" outofmemory error is appearing every time I try to log in on someone's server.
@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe" Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
This is exactly what I have inside the run.bat.
A fast reply, containing helpful information would greatly be appreciated.

item.title: Java Heap Error - OutofMemory ; Help as Soon as Possible Would be Appreciated
item.dc:creator: @rraayy rraayy
item.description:
@rraayy wrote:

Mmm… I use Debian…
and i had that problem to… i used this code
java -Xmx512 server

But i forgot a “M” but now it works fine
i start my server with this code:
java -Xmx512m server

-Xmx512m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32

Maybe?

Read full topic
item.source: Java Heap Error - OutofMemory ; Help as Soon as Possible Would be Appreciated

item.title: Java Heap Error - OutofMemory ; Help as Soon as Possible Would be Appreciated
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

ok easy, change “highmem” to “lowmem” that should do it, if not i will get ya another set of run.bat data.

Read full topic
